SqlConfig.实存账户Sql: select sum(md-mc) from cae_u8..gl_accvouch where ccode like '121501%'or ccode like '12150301%' or ccode like '12150302%'
SqlConfig.当年借款Sql: select sum(md-mc) from cae_u8..gl_accvouch where ccode like '121502%'or ccode like '121504%'
SqlConfig.以前年度借款Sql: select sum(md-mc) from cae_u8..gl_accvouch where ccode like '12150303%'or ccode like '12150304%'
